problem.p: How much introductory physics have you studied?

choice.name: more_than_year_college
choice.text: More than one year of introductory physics in college/university

choice.name: one_year_or_less_college
choice.text: One year or less of introductory physics in college/university

choice.name: more_than_year_secondary
choice.text: More than one year of introductory physics in high school/secondary school

choice.name: one_year_or_less_secondary
choice.text: One year or less of introductory physics in high school/secondary school
